title: FPS drop summoner's rift
body:
hey guys, im a d5 jg main. Recently I have been experiencing fps drops around the 2:45 min mark everytime i play on summoner's rift (doesnt happen for arams) and it negatively impacts my performance. It usually happens when i start my second buff and then my fps suddenly goes from 60 to 30ish then some times around 20. I play on the lowest res and lowest quality to increase performance but it doesnt work. This is super annoying and i hope if riot or someone can see this and tell me whether i should change some settings or just I need a new pc.
Thx

replies.body: This could be caused by a failing game file or driver and resulting in some fps loss.  Run through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune things up, and you can also take a look at our [minimum specs ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements)guide to make sure your pc can run League.  I hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AaeJ2gp9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-15T20:47:33.693+0000)
>
> This could be caused by a failing game file or driver and resulting in some fps loss.  Run through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune things up, and you can also take a look at our [minimum specs ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements)guide to make sure your pc can run League.  I hope that helps!

thank you
